name: National Hotel

reviews.text: We had a standard 2 bedroom, about 280 SF, including bathroom. The appearance and decor was plain.
reviews.title: Mixed feelings

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The bathroom was a problem. If you wanted to take a shower in our bathroom, you had to climb over the tub rim which was 22 inches high, making it difficult to get in and out, especially for older people. (Try it) At home, ours is 15 inches. The floor of the tub was not comfortable to stand on, and there was no grab bar or soap dish. The design of the shower protection was such that the floor was sure to get wet.
reviews.title: Great place

reviews.text: The location and service were good. Breakfast was modest but adequate.
reviews.title: Great and in a Great place

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Great place, very convenient location, close to everything. Super service in reception. Breakfast wasn't that good, it's ok if you are early bird, but later you arrive, less you get. But anyhow I highly recommend this hotel. Be aware that you will hear some street noise time to time.
reviews.title: Nice city hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This is an elegant four starr Hotel and I was upgraded the corner room on the top floor that I was given was large and very comfortable . The breakfast was nice , my only critism was the laundry
reviews.title: Great place to stay in Old Town

description: Hotel with more than 100-year hospitality traditions provided in the building. It is located in the 19th-century building, combines vivid character of a seaside home with the classic sophistication of high standard hotel. The windows of hotel overlook the Dane River embankment and house roofs of old town of Klaipeda. Part of the building faces the most famous Theatre square with open market and main city cultural events being held.
